channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump and Harris Neck and Neck in a New Poll, and a Manhunt in Kentucky
item.description: Plus, a Pulitzer-winning Super Bowl halftime headliner.

item.title: Middle East Crisis: At Least 14 Killed in Airstrikes in Syria, State Media Reports
item.description: Syria blamed Israel for what appeared to be one of the deadliest waves of attacks in the country in months. Israel did not immediately comment.

item.title: Bill Gates says retirement ‘sounds awful’ and wants to work another 30 years
item.description: “My friend Warren Buffett still comes into the office six days a week. So, I hope my health allows me to be like Warren.”

item.title: A Tug Between Russia and Europe Divides Montenegro
item.description: A falling-out between former political allies in Montenegro has complicated the country’s efforts to join the European Union and curb pro-Russian infl...

item.title: A Tug Between Russia and Europe Divides Montenegro
item.description: A falling-out between former political allies in Montenegro has complicated the country’s efforts to join the European Union and curb pro-Russian infl...

item.title: Santander boasted ‘flexibility is here to stay,’ then ramped up its RTO mandate—lumping its U.K. CEO with a 160-mile commute
item.description: Santander's U.K. boss Mike Regnier travels about 160 miles to the office on select days as five in-person days were not "vital," he said earlier this ...

item.title: The Pope’s Asia-Pacific Visit, in Pictures
item.description: Francis is undertaking an 11-day journey to Indonesia, Papua New Guinea, East Timor and Singapore.

item.title: How to Wash Laundry in an Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Way
item.description: The suds that go down the drain can be harmful to wildlife. We’ve got tips on how to clean clothes and support nature.

item.title: Taking the $604,000 Lamborghini Revuelto Hybrid for a ride: a review
item.description: Some cars are better than others, and the astounding Lamborghini Revuelto is just that, according to Hannah Elliott.

item.title: To Reverse Economic Decline, Europe Must Overhaul Its Strategy, Report Says
item.description: Europe, facing a shrinking share of the global economy, needs to increase its spending on tech and defense, according to a long-awaited report from Ma...

item.title: After a Century and a Half in Sweden, Finnish Skulls Return Home
item.description: Dozens of skulls exhumed in Finland in the 19th century and taken to Sweden by scientists who wanted to study their racial characteristics were reburi...

item.title: Ryanair boss Michael O’Leary tells air traffic control chief to quit to ‘allow someone competent’ to take charge after London flight chaos
item.description: O'Leary blasted Nats chief Martin Rolfe after London Gatwick airport was hit with hundreds by hundreds of delays on Sunday.

item.title: What to Watch at the Donald Trump-Kamala Harris Debate
item.description: As the candidates meet for their only scheduled debate on Tuesday night, here is what to be on the lookout for.

item.title: El Salvador’s Police Chief Dies in Helicopter Crash
item.description: Mauricio Arriaza Chicas led the nation’s police force during a crackdown on gang violence. The president expressed doubt that the crash had been an ac...

item.title: Asda may face an £1.2 billion equal pay claim that could trigger a multi-billion-pound reckoning for U.K. supermarkets
item.description: A hearing on Monday will decide whether the jobs of more than 60,000 Asda workers, who are mostly women and paid lower hourly rates, were of equal val...
